name: Honor Bound Coalition
description:
In the wasteland, you have the unique tool to create a prosperous and alive field again, use the G.E.C.K. (Garden of Eden Creation Kit) to bring new hope for humanity.

# Controls:

  • A / S / D / W: Movement
  • Left Shift (hold): Run
  • I: Interaction
  • K: Change equipped tool

# Global Game Jam 2020

  • https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/honor-bound-coalition-3
